attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
After the recent murders in Ipswich, is it not about time that Capital Punishment was reinstated?
We are hearing of murders every day now, and a deterrent is now needed.
The Government is going on about overcrowding in prisons, this would also help this problem.
Why should we house murderers?......HANG THEM!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
